mapper.select: select a.lower_level_id as userId, b.level as actingLevel, c.commission_amount as commissionAmount, c.amount as amount, d.create_date as createDate from acting_hierarchy_relation a left join acting b on a.acting_id = b.id left join acting_detail c on a.id = c.hierarchy_relation_id left join sys_user d on a.user_id = d.id where a.superior_id = #{request.userId}
